main.name: Alec Cumming
main.description: I am a software developer and computer science student. I am a great team player and am always eager to learn about new technologies. My specialties are in web development using technologies including JavaScript, ReactJS and NodeJS
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Worked with the existing prototype of a web-based software application and brought it to a state of market readiness. Technologies included AWS, JavaScript, NodeJS, ExpressJS, ReactJS, and MySQL.

work.title: Groundskeeper and Facilities Worker
work.description: Completed daily inspection and maintenance of attractions. Primary duties included leaf blowing, power washing and general cleaning prior to opening. Also completed weekly transportation of supplies across the bridge.

work.title: Maintenance Worker
work.description: Completed maintenance and general upkeep of the church grounds. Primary duties included moving furniture, painting, and junk deliveries.
